revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Linksys EA3500 01.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Wireless N750 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://www.linksys.com/us/support-product/?pid=01t80000003K7bbAAC |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Linksys |model = EA3500 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 02/02/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Linksys_EA3500 |wlclass = AN750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-EA3500 |icid = 3839A-EA3500 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 48RGWM06.SGB |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6282;Armada 300, (Feroceon core); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 <!-- TE --> |cpu1_type_rev = (ARMADA 300) |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 1.2 / 1.6 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U518S2CTR-BC;3,3V 8-bit; |flash1size = 64 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS5162GFR-S6C; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6171R; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 20:AA:4B,C8:D7:19 |oui = 20:AA:4B,C8:D7:19
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stockos = Linux;2.6.35.8;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, J7,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = yes,, 8-pin header,, J8,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2598L;SiGe, 2598L, 247GF;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2567L;SiGe, 2567L, 315AR;3; ,,, 2A, 2V Non-Synchronous Buck Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS54231;;1; ,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Three Buck Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS65251;;1; ,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Buck Switcher;Texas Instruments;TPS54325;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = RGWM06 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, LEDE Project,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/02/2012 |estreldate = 04/04/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883596782 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B007IL6OR2 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8366;v48; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Marvell;88W8366;v48; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "48RGWM06.SGB" and "Manuf. for CISCO" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. ODM vendor changed to ''[[Wistron NeWeb]]'' instead of ''[[CyberTAN]]''
{{WiFiCert|WFA13839|11/26/2011}} [[Talk:Linksys EA3500|About the System-on-Chip Model Number]]
